video_prompt: Anime character's lavender hair sways. Her purple eyes shift. Light blue earrings subtly sway. Puffed sleeves subtly move. Skirt's gradient shifts as tassels gently swing. Fingerless gloves adjust. Boots subtly shift position. Lighting dynamically highlights textures.
image_prompt: anime female character, full body, white background. Long straight lavender hair, purple eyes, light blue earrings. Wearing a light purple long-sleeved puffed jacket, white crop top with pink/purple/teal heart logo, black chest straps. Short pleated skirt (purple to blue gradient), light blue tassels. Black shorts, black fingerless gloves, black military boots with light blue laces and buckles. Smooth, glossy texture, even front lighting, sharp vibrant anime style, clear outlines, bright bold colors.
refined_video_prompt: Hair sways, eyes shift. Earrings and puffed sleeves subtly move. Skirt's gradient shifts as tassels gently swing. Gloves adjust and boots subtly shift. Dynamic lighting accentuates textures.
